nupurchandra1: Gr8 tips but it's not just about travel to a safe country that counts but also the travel through airports and public transports that matter at this time. No one wants to scare their loved ones unnecessarily, the whole world is scared right now and shutting themselves from each other. If travel cannot be avoided, precautions is all one can take. The cases that soared here in UK happened exactly after term break when most families returned from Europe and other destinations and unknowingly brought infections here via travel. We all by now know where this virus originated and how it has travelled world over. We can only try to be safe rather than sorry...
